content: A message was moved here from #warg > stream events by Mossaka (Joe).
Hi Mossaka! We called it early as a whole bunch of folks are still out and there wasn't much on the agenda other than doing just a few quick implementation status updates.
I think next week's meeting is definitely on as people will be back
I'm not going to be able to make the meeting today.
For anyone in the SIG Meeting, you're able to rejoin now.

As discussed in today's SIG meeting, I am proposing that we unify the main SIG and working group meetings and repositories. We'll vote on this proposal at next week's meeting.
https://github.com/bytecodealliance/SIG-Registries/discussions/49

Propose: Unifying registry meetings and repositories 路 bytecodealliance/SIG-Registries 路 Discussion #49
Historically, the SIG-Registries repo has been used to hold meeting minutes, proposals, and general docs; and the registry repo has been used to hold the current registry prototype work. We've also...

Sorry for any confusion with the meeting invite for tomorrow. I won't be able to attend tomorrow and deleted it off my calendar. Unfortunately, this deleted it for everyone else as well (which I had forgotten it would do) so I've recreated tomorrows meeting. If you see extra notifications, that's why, and nothing is actually changing there.

However, we are moving towards using a Google Group to manage meeting invites so that it's easier for people to join and leave.

If you'd like to keep receiving invites to the SIG-Registries meetings or you're new to the group and want to check it out, please follow the link at the bottom and click join. The Google Group is already on the meeting invite, so you'll automatically be invited to future meetings.
https://groups.google.com/g/ba-sig-registries
Sorry I dropped out there at the end; Firefox was misbehaving
No school / kids home today b/c of eid; going to miss the meeting
